content: simple stylish and above all comfy the mystical hat comes in sizes for all the family from newborn baby to large adult the classic style makes them the perfect crochet hat for boys and girls and a super baby shower gift worked in simple crochet stitches and packed full of texture they are a breeze to make and a delight to wear this is a crochet pattern for the mystical hat a quick and easy crochet pattern that is great for gifts for the whole family the hats are crocheted using us single_crochet and half_double_crochet stitches *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english not a finished product pattern features sizes included newborn baby toddler 2-6 years 6-12 years teen/small adult medium adult large adult skill level easy stitch half_double_crochet and single_crochet instant pdf download full video tutorial to support written pattern if you are a visual learner us crochet terms uk stitch conversion chart why you ll love this pattern versatile design customize the cuff and height to suit great for gifts a wonderful gift to crochet and give at any time of the year detailed instructions 14-page pdf in us crochet terms for clear easy-to-follow guidance materials needed category 3 double knit yarn i used amigo dk 100% acrylic 175m / 191yds / 50g approx 1 1 1 1 1 1 2 2 balls of yarn for the crochet hats approx 69 77 96 107 130 161 191 210 yds crochet hook 4mm g or the size that meets the gauge for the pattern yarn needle scissors stitch markers pattern includes detailed instructions over 14 page ebook stitch guide sizing chart/schematic step by step stitch tutorial colour inspiration page full video tutorial customisation guide ideal for christmas or seasonal gifts matching family sets instant download start crocheting your own easy hat today purchase includes immediate access to the 14-page pdf pattern in us crochet terms gauge 19 sts and 16 row = 4 by 4 discover a quick and easy crochet beanie pattern that you ll love to create featuring stunning texture and a flattering design perfect for everyone need help we re here for you contact us anytime for pattern support or questions note this listing is for a digital download pdf pattern not the finished item due to the nature of digital downloads no refunds will be issued © 2024 hanjan crochet ltd all rights reserved this pattern and its content are
